Object.Name: Device Binding
Object.Description1: Binds the EMM Platform to some device, as in the device the EMM is physically connected to and measuring.

Item.Name: DeviceName
Item.Description: Name of the device under measurement, e.g. "Wireless Access Point".

Item.Name: DeviceID
Item.Description: Identifier for the device under measurement, e.g. serial number, IP or MAC address

Item.Name: DevicePhysLoc
Item.Description: The physical location of the device, e.g. floor/corridor/room
